page.title: 13LAW AND ORDER
page.content: THE local police station is situated on the high street. There is one inspector, four sargeants, thirty constables and three traffic wardens. The design of the new police car is American. They also have a Range Rover for traffic control. The station makes use of a computer to get information on crime. Trafic police use a special instrument (looks like a gun) to measure the speed of cars on the roads. It gives them an accurate reading. One of the police officers is also involved in community liason.
